    • Constructor Detail

      • DnxDocumentHelper.EnvironmentHardware

        public DnxDocumentHelper.EnvironmentHardware()

      • DnxDocumentHelper.EnvironmentHardware

        public DnxDocumentHelper.EnvironmentHardware(java.lang.String hardwareName,
                                     java.lang.String hardwareType,
                                     java.lang.String hardwareOtherInformation)
        Creates the EnvironmentHardware section.
        Parameters:
        hardwareName - Manufacturer, model, and version (if applicable) of the hardware. (for example, Intel Pentium III)
        hardwareType - Class or category of the hardware. (for example, processor, memory, input/output device)
        hardwareOtherInformation - Additional requirements or instructions related to the hardware referenced in hwName. (for example, 32MB minimum)
